summary: A couple visits the husband's family in India and finds itself in the middle of a fratricidal battle.
cast: Karisma Kapoor|Nana Patekar|Sanjay Kapoor|Jai Gidwani|Shah Rukh Khan|Deepti Naval|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Vijay Raaz|Tiku Talsania|Jaspal Bhatti|Prabhu Deva|Divya Dutta|Chandrakant Gokhale|Chris Ippolito|Prakash Raj|Ritu Shivpuri|Anupam Shyam|Rajshree Solanki|Rocky Verma|Zerifa Wahid
title: Shakthi: The Power
